item.title: Open Policy Agent Gatekeeper
item.description: Gatekeeper is a validating webhook with auditing capabilities that can enforce custom resource definition-based policies that are run with the Open Policy Agent (OPA). Gatekeeper constraints can be used to evaluate Kubernetes resource compliance. You can leverage OPA as the policy engine, and use Rego as the policy language. Installing Gatekeeper Sample Gatekeeper policy Installing Gatekeeper See the Gatekeeper documentation to install the desired version of Gatekeeper to the managed cluster.
